Prerequisites
=============

Before diving into the use of Apache JMeter and Selenium for recording and functional testing, it is important to ensure that your environment is properly set up. This section outlines the necessary system requirements and installation instructions to facilitate a smooth testing experience. Having the right tools and configurations will enable you to effectively implement the testing strategies discussed in this documentation.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1
   :titlesonly:

   requirement
   install
